sentence: Steve Gaynor and Karrin Taylor Robson are sitting on millions for their gubernatorial campaigns as they prepare to hit the airwaves, while Katie Hobbs and Kari Lake offset strong fundraising numbers with big spending.
author: Jeremy Duda
title: As first campaign finance reports are filed, Arizona governorâ€™s race comes into focus

sentence: Secretary of State Katie Hobbs, the Democratic frontrunner, called on the Senate to raise the limit and save K-12 schools from "this manufactured funding crisis."
author: Jeremy Duda
title: No Republican candidates for Arizona governor are calling for school cuts to be stopped

sentence: Karrin Taylor Robson, the other major GOP candidate for governor, and Democrat Katie Hobbs have thus far been silent, which might have been a good strategy for Lake.
author: Laurie Roberts
title: No, Kari Lake, what is going on at the border isn't remotely like what is going on in Ukraine
